glosses: someone who is named ..., something which is called ...

examples.text: hiç "peskütan" diye bir peynir türü duymuş muydun? - have you ever heard of a kind of cheese called "peskütan"?

glosses: in order to, to, for to

examples.translation: he/she hid in the closet in order not to go to the school!
you answered all the questions as "I don't know"
